question.string: Which ships were called after Benjamin Franklin?
Welche Schiffe wurden nach Benjamin Franklin benannt?
¿Qué barcos fueron bautizados en honor a Benjamin Franklin?
Quali navi sono state battezzate in onore di Benjamin Franklin?
Quels bâteaux portent le nom de Benjamin Franklin?
Welke schepen zijn genoemd naar Benjamin Franklin?
Ce nave au fost numite după Benjamin Franklin?
question.query: PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri dbp:shipNamesake res:Benjamin_Franklin . ?uri rdf:type dbo:Ship . }
